snippet: Trustees trying to unravel what happened at MF Global have focused on one technique, allowed under current accounting rules, that allowed the firm to buy bonds and book immediate profits.
abstract: Floyd Norris High & Low Finance column observes that trustees trying to unravel what happened at MF Global have focused on one technique, granted under current accounting rules, that allowed the firm to buy bonds and book immediate profits; contends bad accounting at the company both encouraged and obscured risk-taking that ended in collapse and scandal.
lead_paragraph: Trustees trying to unravel what happened at MF Global have focused on one technique, allowed under current accounting rules, that allowed the firm to buy bonds and book immediate profits.

headline.seo: MF Global Case Exposes Weakness in Accounting Rules
